class: inverse middle center

#### Highcharte`R` Drilldown
###### Z-scores (Mean = 0, SD = 1)

```{r}
patient <- "Biggie"
```

```{r drillz-data}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
neurocog <- read_csv("neurocog.csv")
```

```{r}
colors <-
  c(
    "#058DC7",
    "#50B432",
    "#ED561B",
    "#DDDF00",
    "#24CBE5",
    "#64E572",
    "#FF9655",
    "#FFF263",
    "#6AF9C4"
  )
```

```{r cog}
## Level 1
## Domain scores
# 1. create mean z-scores for domain
ncog1 <- neurocog %>%
  group_by(domain) %>%
  summarize(
    zMean = mean(z),
    zPct = mean(percentile),
    range1 = range
  )

# 2. sort hi to lo
ncog1 <- arrange(ncog1, desc(zMean))

# 3. create tibble with new column with domain name lowercase
ncogL1status <- tibble(
  name = ncog1$domain,
  y = ncog1$zMean,
  y2 = ncog1$zPct,
  drilldown = tolower(name)
)

# 4. round z-score to 1 decimal
ncogL1status$y <- round(ncogL1status$y, 1)
ncogL1status$y2 <- round(ncogL1status$y2, 0)

## Level 2
## Subdomain scores
## function to create second level of drilldown (subdomain scores)
ncogL2drill <-
  lapply(unique(neurocog$domain), function(x_level) {
    # 1. create mean z-scores for domain
    # ncog2 becomes pronoun for neurocog
    ncog2 <- subset(neurocog, neurocog$domain %in% x_level)

    # same as above
    ncog2 <- ncog2 %>%
      group_by(subdomain) %>%
      summarize(zMean = mean(z), zPct = mean(percentile))

    # 2. sort hi to lo
    ncog2 <- arrange(ncog2, desc(zMean))

    # 3. create tibble with new column with domain name lowercase
    ncogL2status <- tibble(
      name = ncog2$subdomain,
      y = ncog2$zMean,
      y2 = ncog2$zPct,
      drilldown = tolower(paste(x_level, name, sep = "_"))
    )

    # 4. round z-score to 1 decimal
    ncogL2status$y <- round(ncogL2status$y, 1)
    ncogL2status$y2 <- round(ncogL2status$y2, 0)

    list(
      id = tolower(x_level),
      type = "column",
      data = list_parse(ncogL2status)
    )
  })
## Level 3
## Narrow subdomain
## reuse function
ncogL3drill <-
  lapply(unique(neurocog$domain), function(x_level) {
    ncog2 <-
      subset(neurocog, neurocog$domain %in% x_level) # make sure this should be domain and not subdomain

    # reuse function but with y_level
    lapply(unique(ncog2$subdomain), function(y_level) {
      # 1. create mean z-scores for subdomain
      # ncog3 becomes pronoun for domain
      ncog3 <- subset(ncog2, ncog2$subdomain %in% y_level)

      ncog3 <- ncog3 %>%
        group_by(narrow) %>%
        summarize(zMean = mean(z), zPct = mean(percentile))

      ncog3 <- arrange(ncog3, desc(zMean))

      ncogL3status <- tibble(
        name = ncog3$narrow,
        y = ncog3$zMean,
        y2 = ncog3$zPct,
        drilldown = tolower(paste(x_level, y_level, name, sep = "_"))
      )

      ncogL3status$y <- round(ncogL3status$y, 1)
      ncogL3status$y2 <- round(ncogL3status$y2, 0)

      list(
        id = tolower(paste(x_level, y_level, sep = "_")),
        type = "column",
        data = list_parse(ncogL3status)
      )
    })
  }) %>% unlist(recursive = FALSE)

## Level 4
## Scale scores
ncogL4drill <-
  lapply(unique(neurocog$domain), function(x_level) {
    ncog2 <- subset(neurocog, neurocog$domain %in% x_level)

    lapply(unique(ncog2$subdomain), function(y_level) {
      ncog3 <- subset(ncog2, ncog2$subdomain %in% y_level)

      lapply(unique(ncog3$narrow), function(z_level) {
        ncog4 <- subset(ncog3, ncog3$narrow %in% z_level)

        ncog4 <- ncog4 %>%
          group_by(scale) %>%
          summarize(zMean = mean(z), zPct = mean(percentile))

        ncog4 <- arrange(ncog4, desc(zMean))

        ncogL4status <- tibble(
          name = ncog4$scale,
          y = ncog4$zMean,
          y2 = ncog4$zPct
        )

        ncogL4status$y <- round(ncogL4status$y, 1)
        ncogL4status$y2 <- round(ncogL4status$y2, 0)

        list(
          id = tolower(paste(x_level, y_level, z_level, sep = "_")),
          type = "column",
          data = list_parse2(ncogL4status)
        )
      })
    }) %>% unlist(recursive = FALSE)
  }) %>% unlist(recursive = FALSE)
```

```{r drillz-tooltip, fig.cap='Drilldown Neuropsych zScores', fig.width=12, fig.height=8, fig.retina=3, out.width = "100%"}
## for Tooltip

ncogL1status <- ncogL1status %>%
  mutate(
    range = case_when(
      y >= 1.9 ~ "Exceptionally High",
      y == 1.5 ~ "Above Average",
      y == 1.4 ~ "Above Average",
      y == 1.2 ~ "High-Average",
      y == 1.1 ~ "High-Average",
      y == .7 ~ "High-Average",
      y == .2 ~ "Average",
      y == .0 ~ "Average",
      y == -.6 ~ "Low-Average"
    )
  )

x <- c("Name", "Score", "Percentile", "Range")
y <- c("{point.name}", "{point.y}", "{point.y2}", "{point.range}")
tt <- tooltip_table(x, y)

# Create drilldown bar plot zscores
p1 <-
  highchart() %>%
  hc_title(
    text = patient,
    style = list(fontSize = "15px")
  ) %>%
  hc_add_series(
    ncogL1status,
    type = "bar",
    name = "Neuropsychological Test Scores",
    hcaes(x = name, y = y)
  ) %>%
  hc_xAxis(
    type = "category",
    title = list(text = "Domain"),
    categories = .$name
  ) %>%
  hc_yAxis(
    title = list(text = "z-score"),
    labels = list(format = "{value}")
  ) %>%
  hc_tooltip(
    pointFormat = tt,
    useHTML = TRUE,
    valueDecimals = 1
  ) %>%
  hc_plotOptions(
    series = list(
      colorByPoint = TRUE,
      allowPointSelect = TRUE,
      dataLabels = TRUE
    )
  ) %>%
  hc_drilldown(
    allowPointDrilldown = TRUE,
    series = c(ncogL2drill, ncogL3drill, ncogL4drill)
  ) %>%
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_smpl())
p1
```
